title: Need gifts for a gamer this holiday season? We’ve got recommendations.
description: Before you buy, read our video game gift recommendations — from books to makeup to monitors.

title: The racing drone that could kill
description: The Israeli-made Lanius is a tiny racing drone that can scout and kill enemies using artificial intelligence. It’s a nightmare scenario for weapons critics.

title: Musk summons engineers to Twitter HQ as millions await platform’s collapse
description: Elon Musk issued an email call-to-arms to Twitter's remaining engineers to assemble at 2 p.m. as the site tries to adjust to the resignations of hundreds of employees in response to an ultimatum Musk issued on Wednesday.

title: After ‘Pokémon Scarlet’ and ‘Violet,’ we can’t give Game Freak a pass
description: "Scarlet" and "Violet" aren’t the first Pokémon games with technical issues. But the games’ historically bad graphics may have crossed a line.

title: Hook, line and sinker: How fishing minigames became a video game mainstay
description: There has been virtual fishing nearly as long as there have been video games. We asked developers: Why?

title: How to download your tweets in case Twitter shuts down permanently
description: As hundreds of Twitter employees reportedly choose to leave Twitter following Musk's ultimatum, here's what you need to know about the platform's future.

title: For ‘hardcore’ workers, sleeping at the office makes a comeback
description: Twitter’s billionaire leader Elon Musk is pushing a workplace culture focused on long hours and intense workdays — a familiar trope in Silicon Valley.

title: Elizabeth Holmes faces possible prison time as sentencing begins
description: Former Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes faces sentencing from a federal judge Friday.
